name: Auroratech Company
description: Developer of an augmented reality system designed to build the next-generation augmented reality optics and display modules. The company offers augmented reality glasses that provide a view that works under daylight, have bio-sensor inputs, and use a microdisplay instead of a huge display phone, and artificial intelligence for empowering and connecting people, enabling clients to read emotional feedback and molecule structure in the environment with use cases in global telepresence, training, and visualization.
one_liner: Developer of an augmented reality system designed to build the next-generation augmented reality optics and display modules. The company offers augmented reality glasses that provide a view that works under daylight, have bio-sensor inputs, and use a microdisplay instead of a huge display phone, and artificial intelligence for empowering and connecting people, enabling clients to read emotional feedback and molecule structure in the environment with use cases in global telepresence, training, and visualization.
